text: hananimkkeseoneun midneun jadeul-ui gahojaisini, amheug-eseo gwangmyeong-eulo geudeul-eul kkeonaesinola. bulsinhaneun jadeul, geudeul-ui gahojaneun usang-ini, gwangmyeong-eseo amheug-eulo geudeul-eul kkeonaenola. jeodeul-eun buljiog-ui geojujadeul-ini sillo geudeul-eun geu an-eseo meomul geos-ila
